name: Blood & Honor: WWII
description:
Classic board gameplay spiced up with card superpowers will keep you hooked for hours on end. War board aficionados will love the deep strategy layer of the card Battle Deck.

Online multiplayer will you give you endless adversaries to fight. AI opponents, meanwhile, will keep you entertained on those long flights.

Friends and family at home? Turn your tablet into a board game using Pass and play.

Blood & Honor Highlights:
- Online multiplayer with realtime battles
- League system with promotions and demotions every week
- Free to play
- Pass and play local multiplayer
- Smart AI bots that don't cheat!
- Missions to complete throughout the games
- Different Factions to pick
- 2v2 and 3v3 team battles!
- Multiple maps and tons of rule customization options for endless fun

If you find a bug please help us by reporting it. You can email us at contact@sandstorminteractive.com. Thank you!

Get your risk fix now! Download and play against thousands of other players!

- You may turn off auto-renewal from your iTunes Account Settings. However, you won’t be able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a VIP Subscription.
